Room.Name: Necropolis Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Necropolis Avenue, west of Danielle's Mage Emporium.
Room.LongDescription: Mistress Danielle Chanteclaire is one of the only arch-mages in Oceancrest and has achieved this rank at but the mere age of 623, very young for a grey elf. There are only a handful of known arch-mages that ever existed in the world. This is usually very good because the power which comes with this rank is also very powerful and manipulative.
